channel.title: Someone help with Update command :)

item.title: Someone help with Update command :)
item.dc:creator: @mage_tester2 mage tester2
item.description:
@mage_tester2 wrote:

Hi Everyone, I am new to creating a Server. I just created an “update” command. That when a person with rights = to 2, types ::update it gives a message. Unfortunately It only gives that message to the person who typed that command.

What do I have to do to make that send to everyone who is currently on the server, I want it to display the exact same message the person who typed the command receives. This is my code:

508 Server btw.

I am using the Mezzy-Scape source btw.

} else if (cmd[0].equals(“update”) && (p.rights >= 2)) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, "<img=1><img=1><col=FF3300>[SERVER] Update: <img=1> 30 seconds till disconnect "+Misc.optimizeText(p.username));

Read full topic
